sec.p: All statistics and analyses were conducted in the R computing environment. Specifically, we used the dredge function in the MuMIn ( 56) package for model selection, the ppcor ( 57) package for variance decomposition, the nlme ( 58) package for generalized additive model analyses, and the RnetCDF ( 59), raster ( 60), and rworldmap ( 61) packages for spatial analyses and map plots. We examined all ordinary least squares linear regressions for to ensure that they met key assumptions using quantile and other diagnostic plots.
